# supportedLocales

**Type Property**

The set of all possible asset locales that the module supports.

## Declaration

```swift
static var supportedLocales: [Locale] { get async }
```

## Getting supported locales

- **supportedLocale(equivalentTo:)**: A locale from the module’s supported locales equivalent to the given locale.

items.description: A locale from the module’s supported locales equivalent to the given locale.
items.name: supportedLocale(equivalentTo:)
